Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Godunov, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Sanduny Bath House and minutes from Gulag History Museum. This hotel is close to Red Square and St. Basil's Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 78 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and coffee/tea in the lobby.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 78 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hotel Godunov, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Sanduny Bath House and minutes from Gulag History Museum. This hotel is close to Red Square and St. Basil's Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sanduny Bath House - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Gulag History Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
TSUM Department Store - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
The State Literary Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
FSB Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Vysokopetrovsky Monastery - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bolshoi Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Moscow Museum of Modern Art - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Moscow Circus on Tsvetnoy Boulevard - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Maly Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Stanislavski and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Academic Music Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Moscow Theatre Et Cetera - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hermitage Garden - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Yury Dolgoruky Monument - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Moscow Arts Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Godunov is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 25.9 km / 16.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
